data.title: Golden Temple: Man beaten to death over 'sacrilege' bid
data.description: The incident took place when the man jumped golden grills inside the sanctum sanctorum, picked a sword and reached near the place where a Sikh priest was reciting the holy Guru Granth Sahib.

data.author: Shweta Sengar
data.title: Hospitals In India To Get 'Breastfeeding-friendly' Tags As Caeserean Deliveries Rise
data.description: In a new initiative launched by the largest association of private hospitals, hospitals in Delhi will be certified as "breastfeeding friendly". According to a report by The Times of India, the move comes in the wake of the latest national family health survey ( NFHS ) showing a further increase in caesarean deliveries. Caesarean section delivery is associated with 46 per cent lower prevalence of early initiation of breastfeeding.

data.title: Internet Troll Sued For Rs 7.52 Lakh After Posting Fake Negative Reviews About Restaurant
data.description: Martin Stewart Potts wrote ten fake reviews about Bispham Kitchen, with one claiming that the restaurant's food made him, his wife and his children sick. He also claimed that the restaurant's haddock was in fact 'catfish' and that their chips were 'fried in burnt oil'.

data.description: Kanika Tekriwal battled cancer at the age of 22 and stepped into the Indian aviation industry just about 2 year later to start her dream venture Jetsetgo Aviation Services Private Limited in 2013.
